thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Euston Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very Comfortable Stay
thread.title_full: Very Comfortable Stay - Review of Premier Inn London Euston Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Nigel M
title: Very Comfortable Stay
text: An excellent hotel situated very close to Euston, King's Cross and St. Pancras Railway Stations and the London Underground and nearby bus routes running past the hotel. I was lucky to have a ground floor room which was very clean, presentable and very comfortable. With excellent double glazing I hardly heard the traffic outside. Breakfast was excellent, both continental and full English available. Staff very helpful, friendly and attentive. Will definitely be staying at this hotel in the future.
